AboutPage.Title: About Page
Content: This project is a collection of mini projects that demonstrate the use of HTML, CSS, JS, ReactJS, and TypeScript.

I am learning about web development by making mini-projects. "Mini Project", where I watch again my learning process as well as can be used as a reference for anyone interested in learning about HTML, CSS, JS, ReactJS, and TypeScript.
Thanks for visiting, I make "Mini Projects" with all my heart, and I hope you enjoy it. ❤️
